headline: Achieve Life Sciences Announces Partnership with Omnicom to Execute Integrated, Data-Driven Launch of the First Potential New Treatment for Nicotine Dependence in Nearly Two Decades
summary: Omnicom cross-agency collaboration to drive technology-led, innovative launch strategy Partnership brings together promising science, top-tier talent, and advanced technologies to enable a faster, smarter, and more effective path to address a critical public health need SEATTLE and VANCOUVER, British Columbia, June 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Achieve Life Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: ACHV), a late-stage specialty pharmaceutical company focused on the global development and commercialization of cytis
